about_the_game:
Rescape is a 2D vertical-scrolling action-adventure game. The player controls a child who goes on a journey to see the outside of the underworld. Climbing the seamless world, the player will make friends, get equipment for climbing, fight enemies, and discover the secret of the world.
Adventures cannot always be fun. Sometimes you will face difficult terrains or difficult enemies. However, with items obtained from all over the world, you will be able to overcome these difficulties.
In the underworld, there are many hidden secrets. Some are small and trivial, but others have a big impact that changes the way you play. Solve the riddles of the world with the given information!
